languages.text: {n}Кибелла задумывается ненадолго.{/n} "Твое тело не может отправиться с нами, Домин. Но дух... дух может все. Церемония сплетения свершена, мы связаны обетом-на-крови. Думай обо мне, пока я буду охотиться, а я буду думать о тебе. Стань мыслью, вьющейся в моей голове. Если Неумирающий будет милостив, то пошлет тебе грезы, в которых ты узришь меня. Если он будет милостив вдвойне, то эти грезы будут правдой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла задумывается ненадолго.{/n} "Твое тело не может отправиться с нами, Эним. Но дух... дух может все. Церемония Туэ'ри свершена, мы связаны обетом-на-крови и достигли гармонии между разумом и телами. Если тебе будет угодно, я открываю свой разум, свои глаза и уши для тебя, Эним. Смотри мной, слышь мной, запоминай мной. Стань мыслью, вьющейся в моей голове. Идущие стезей Анн'шини называют подобное единение "нитью, сплетающей души".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла задумывается ненадолго.{/n} "Твое тело не может отправиться с нами, Домин. Но дух... дух может все. Церемония сплетения свершена, мы связаны обетом-на-крови. Думай обо мне, пока я буду охотиться, а я буду думать о тебе. Стань мыслью, вьющейся в моей голове. Если Неумирающий будет милостив, то пошлет тебе грезы, в которых ты узришь меня. Если он будет милостив вдвойне, то эти грезы будут правдой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

{n}Kibellah reflects briefly.{/n} "Your body cannot go with us, Enim. But the spirit... The spirit is boundless. The Tue'ri ceremony is complete, we are bound by the blood oath and have attained harmony between bodies and minds. If it pleases you, I shall open my mind, my eyes and ears to you, Enim. Watch through me, listen through me, remember through me. Become a thought passing through my head. Those who walk the path of Ahn'shini call this kind of unity 'a thread that intertwines between souls'".

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

{n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us here, Enim. But your spirit... your spirit is boundless. The Tue'ri ceremony is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath, having attained mutual harmony in both body and mind. If it pleases you, I shall open my thoughts, my eyes, and my ears to you, Enim. See through me, hear through me, remember through me. Become the passing idea as it drifts through my head. Those who walk the path of Ahn'shini call this kind of unity 'the thread that weaves souls together'".

The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah denkt einen Moment nach.{/n} "Euer Leib kann uns nicht auf diese Jagd begleiten, Domin. Aber Euer Geist ... es gibt nichts, was ein Geist nicht zu tun vermag. Die Verbindung ist abgeschlossen. wir sind nun durch den Bluteid aneinander gebunden. Denkt an mich, während ich jage, so wie ich an Euch denken werde. Werdet ein Gedanke in meinem Verstand. Falls der Todlose gnädig mit uns ist, wird Er Euch Träume schicken, und in diesen Träumen werdet Ihr mich sehen. Ist Er noch großzügiger, werden diese Träume sogar wahr sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah denkt einen Moment nach.{/n} "Euer Leib kann uns nicht auf diese Jagd begleiten, Domin. Aber Euer Geist ... es gibt nichts, was ein Geist nicht zu tun vermag. Die Verbindung ist abgeschlossen. wir sind nun durch den Bluteid aneinander gebunden. Denkt an mich, während ich jage, so wie ich an Euch denken werde. Werdet ein Gedanke in meinem Verstand. Falls der Todlose gnädig mit uns ist, wird Er Euch Träume schicken, und in diesen Träumen werdet Ihr mich sehen. Ist Er noch großzügiger, werden diese Träume sogar wahr sein."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah medita por un momento.{/n} «Su cuerpo no puede acompañarnos en esta persecución, Domin. Pero su espíritu... No hay nada que el espíritu no pueda hacer. El entrelazamiento está completo: usted y yo estamos ahora vinculad{mf|o|a}s por el juramento de sangre. Conviértase en los pensamientos que fluyen por mi mente. Si el Inmortal nos favorece, le enviará sueños en los que me verá. Si nos favorece aún más, esos sueños serán ciertos».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

El entrelazamiento está completo: usted y yo estamos ahora vinculad{mf|o|a}s por el juramento de sangre. Conviértase en los pensamientos que fluyen por mi mente. Si el Inmortal nos favorece, le enviará sueños en los que me verá. Si nos favorece aún más, esos sueños serán ciertos».

languages.text: {n}キベラは束の間考える。{/n}「ドミン、その肉体は今回の追跡には付いてこれません。ですが、その精神は…精神にできないことはありません。トワイニングは完了しました。陛下と我は今、血の誓いで結ばれています。我が狩りをしている間、我のことを考えてください。我も御身のことを想います。我の頭の中を流れる思考となるのです。不死の者が我らに慈悲を与えてくださるならば、夢を送ってくださることでしょう。その夢の中で、我と会うことができます。さらなる慈悲が与えられるのであれば、その夢は真実のものとなります」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは束の間考える。{/n}「ドミン、その肉体は今回の追跡には付いてこれません。ですが、その精神は…精神にできないことはありません。トワイニングは完了しました。陛下と我は今、血の誓いで結ばれています。我が狩りをしている間、我のことを考えてください。我も御身のことを想います。我の頭の中を流れる思考となるのです。不死の者が我らに慈悲を与えてくださるならば、夢を送ってくださることでしょう。その夢の中で、我と会うことができます。さらなる慈悲が与えられるのであれば、その夢は真実のものとなります」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈思考了一会儿。{/n}“秘者，虽然你的肉体无法陪同我们参加这场狩猎，但你的精神……没有任何事情是精神做不到的。盘绕祭礼已经完成，如今你我被鲜血的誓言联结在一起。当我狩猎的时候，你要想着我，而我也会想着你，我们彼此的形象会在你我的意识中流淌。如果不死之神对我们仁慈的话，他会送你入梦，而你会在梦境中看到我。如果祂更仁慈一些的话，那梦境将会与现实别无二致。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈思考了一会儿。{/n}“秘者，虽然你的肉体无法陪同我们参加这场狩猎，但你的精神……没有任何事情是精神做不到的。盘绕祭礼已经完成，如今你我被鲜血的誓言联结在一起。当我狩猎的时候，你要想着我，而我也会想着你，我们彼此的形象会在你我的意识中流淌。如果不死之神对我们仁慈的话，他会送你入梦，而你会在梦境中看到我。如果祂更仁慈一些的话，那梦境将会与现实别无二致。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah prend quelques instants pour réfléchir.{/n} « Votre corps ne peut pas nous accompagner dans cette chasse, Domin. Mais rien ne l'interdit à votre esprit... Le jumelage est achevé : vous et moi sommes désormais {mf|liés|liées} par un pacte de sang. Pensez à moi pendant que je chasserai, et j'en ferai autant de mon côté. Devenez une pensée qui me traverse l'esprit. Si l'Immortel le veut bien, Il vous enverra des rêves dans lesquels vous me verrez. Et s'Il nous porte vraiment dans Son cœur, ces rêves seront véridiques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah prend quelques instants pour réfléchir.{/n} « Votre corps ne peut pas nous accompagner dans cette chasse, Domin. Mais rien ne l'interdit à votre esprit... Le jumelage est achevé : vous et moi sommes désormais {mf|liés|liées} par un pacte de sang. Pensez à moi pendant que je chasserai, et j'en ferai autant de mon côté. Devenez une pensée qui me traverse l'esprit. Si l'Immortel le veut bien, Il vous enverra des rêves dans lesquels vous me verrez. Et s'Il nous porte vraiment dans Son cœur, ces rêves seront véridiques. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah bir süre düşünüyor.{/n} "Bedenin bu kovalamacada bize eşlik edemez Domin. Fakat ruhun... Ruhun yapamayacağı hiçbir şey yoktur. Büküm tamamlandı. Sen ve ben, artık kan yeminiyle bağlıyız. Beni avlanırken düşün, tıpkı benim seni düşüneceğim gibi. Zihnimde akan bir düşünceye dönüş. Ölmeyen bize merhametle yaklaşırsa seninle düşler paylaşacaktır. Bu düşlerde beni göreceksin. Merhametini sürdürürse bu düşlerde hakikati bulacaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah thinks for a moment.{/n} "Your body cannot accompany us on this chase, Domin. But your spirit... there is nothing the spirit cannot do. The twining is complete: you and I are now bound by the blood oath. Think of me while I hunt, as will I think of you. Become a thought flowing through my mind. If the Undying One is gracious to us, He will send you dreams, and in those dreams you will see me. If He is more gracious still, those dreams will be truthful."
